AT.name: Megaman & Bass™
AT.description: Mega Man und sein Widersacher Bass legen alte Feindschaften beiseite und schließen sich zusammen, um eine neue Bedrohung aus der Welt zu schaffen. King, ein von Dr. Wily gebauter Roboter, hat sich gegen seinen Erfinder gewandt und plant den Aufbau seiner eigenen unzerstörbaren Roboterarmee. Spiele als Mega Man oder als Bass und wende ihre speziellen Fähigkeiten an, wie Maga Man's Feuerstöße oder Bass' multidirektionale Schusstechnik. Durchquere unsicheres Terrain, besiege neue Robot Master und jage nach versteckten CDs, die Daten über deine Lieblingscharaktere aus dem Mega Man-Universum freigeben.

AU.name: Megaman™ & Bass
AU.description: Mega Man and his nemesis Bass put old rivalries aside and team up, to take down a new threat. King, a robot built by Dr. Wily, has now turned on its creator and plans to build its own indestructible robot army. Play as either Mega Man or Bass, each with their own unique skills like Mega Man’s charge shots or Bass’s multi-directional firing. Traverse treacherous terrain, defeat new Robot Masters, and hunt down hidden CDs that unlock data about your favourite characters from the Mega Man universe.

BG.name: Megaman™ & Bass
BG.description: Mega Man and his nemesis Bass put old rivalries aside and team up, to take down a new threat. King, a robot built by Dr. Wily, has now turned on its creator and plans to build its own indestructible robot army. Play as either Mega Man or Bass, each with their own unique skills like Mega Man’s charge shots or Bass’s multi-directional firing. Traverse treacherous terrain, defeat new Robot Masters, and hunt down hidden CDs that unlock data about your favourite characters from the Mega Man universe.

BE.name: Megaman & Bass™
BE.description: Mega Man et son ennemi juré, Bass, mettent leurs différends de côté et font équipe pour faire face à une nouvelle menace. King, un robot construit par le Dr Wily, s'est retourné contre son créateur et compte construire sa propre armée de robots indestructibles. Jouez avec Mega Man ou avec Bass, et bénéficiez de leurs capacités uniques, telles que les tirs chargés de Mega Man ou encore les tirs multi-directionnels de Bass. Parcourez des terrains semés d'embûches, combattez de nouveaux Robot Masters et cherchez des CDs cachés qui débloqueront des données sur vos personnages préférés de l'univers Mega Man.

ES.name: Megaman & Bass™
ES.description: Mega Man y su némesis, Bass, dejan sus diferencias a un lado y se unen para enfrentarse a una nueva amenaza. King, un robot construido por el Dr. Wily, se ha rebelado contra su creador y planea crear su propio ejército de robots indestructible. Juega como Mega Man o Bass, cada uno con sus propias habilidades, como los golpes cargados de Mega Man o el disparo multidireccional de Bass. Atraviesa terrenos peligrosos, derrota a los nuevos Robot Masters y encuentra los CD ocultos para desbloquear datos sobre tus personajes favoritos del universo Mega Man.

IT.name: Megaman & Bass™
IT.description: Mega Man e la sua nemesi, Bass, mettono da parte la loro rivalità e uniscono le forze per combattere una nuova minaccia. King, un robot costruito da Dr. Wily, si è rivoltato contro il suo creatore e pianifica di costruire un'armata robot indistruttibile. Gioca nei panni di Mega Man o Bass, ognuno con le proprie abilità uniche, ad esempio i colpi caricati di Mega Man o la capacità di fuoco multidirezionale di Bass. Attraversa terreni impervi, sconfiggi i nuovi Robot Master e trova i CD nascosti per sbloccare le informazioni sui tuoi personaggi preferiti dell'universo di Mega Man.

NL.name: Megaman & Bass™
NL.description: Mega Man en zijn rivaal Bass staken de onderlinge strijd om gezamenlijk een nieuwe dreiging te verslaan. King, een door Dr. Wily gebouwde robot, heeft zich tegen zijn maker gekeerd en is van plan een onverslaanbaar robotleger te creëren. Speel als Mega Man of Bass, ieder met zijn eigen unieke vaardigheden zoals de Charge-schoten van Mega Man en Bass z'n schoten in meerdere richtingen. Doorkruis verradelijk terrein, versla nieuwe Robot Masters, en spoor verborgen CD's op om info over je favoriete personages uit het Mega Man-universum vrij te spelen.

NZ.name: Megaman™ & Bass
NZ.description: Mega Man and his nemesis Bass put old rivalries aside and team up, to take down a new threat. King, a robot built by Dr. Wily, has now turned on its creator and plans to build its own indestructible robot army. Play as either Mega Man or Bass, each with their own unique skills like Mega Man’s charge shots or Bass’s multi-directional firing. Traverse treacherous terrain, defeat new Robot Masters, and hunt down hidden CDs that unlock data about your favourite characters from the Mega Man universe.

PL.name: Megaman™ & Bass
PL.description: Mega Man and his nemesis Bass put old rivalries aside and team up, to take down a new threat. King, a robot built by Dr. Wily, has now turned on its creator and plans to build its own indestructible robot army. Play as either Mega Man or Bass, each with their own unique skills like Mega Man’s charge shots or Bass’s multi-directional firing. Traverse treacherous terrain, defeat new Robot Masters, and hunt down hidden CDs that unlock data about your favourite characters from the Mega Man universe.

PT.name: Megaman & Bass™
PT.description: Mega Man e o seu inimigo Bass põem de lado a velha rivalidade e unem-se para derrotar uma nova ameaça. King, um robô construído pelo Dr. Wily, virou-se contra o seu criador e planeia construir o seu próprio indestrutível exército de robôs. Joga como Mega Man ou Bass, cada um com as suas próprias habilidades únicas, como os tiros de carga do Mega Man ou os disparos multidirecionais do Bass. Atravessa terrenos perigosos, derrota novos Robot Masters e procura CDs escondidos que revelam dados sobre as tuas personagens favoritas do universo Mega Man.

RU.name: Megaman & Bass™
RU.description: Mega Man и его заклятый враг Bass воссоединяют силы против новой угрозы. King, робот созданный Dr. Wily, восстал против своего создателя и планирует построить свою собственную неразрушимую армию роботов. Играйте в роли Mega Man или Bass, используя их уникальные способности, такие как мощный выстрел (Mega Man) и многонаправленная стрельба (Bass). Проходите через враждебную местность, побеждайте новых Robot Masters и выслеживайте спрятанные компакт-диски, содержащие информацию о ваших излюбленных персонажах из вселенной Mega Man.
